Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: The goal is to merge Log A and Log B into a single integrated event log. Log A, from System A, contains events with timestamps based on when they are received, not started, and includes event types.

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Log B, from System B, includes richer attributes like user_id, resource_id, and notes, with timestamps that may be offset. The format is timestamp, event_name, order_id, user_id, resource_id, and notes, providing more context than Log A.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Events are matched using order_id, all labeled as Order1234, simplifying the process. Timestamps must align within a 2-second tolerance, and event names require semantic mapping due to differences.

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Log A events include: Order Received at 2023-10-10T10:00:00Z, Order Validated at 2023-10-10T10:01:30Z, and others up to Item Delivered at 2023-10-10T10:20:00Z. All Log A events are tied to Order1234, focusing on the primary timeline with received timestamps.

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Log B events include: OrderReceived at 2023-10-10T09:59:58Z, OrderValidation at 2023-10-10T10:01:29Z, and others with additional details like user_id and notes. All Log B events also relate to Order1234, with potential timestamp offsets noted in attributes like Payment gateway delay.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Log As Order Received at 10:00:00Z matches Log Bs OrderReceived at 09:59:58Z, within 2 seconds. Log As Order Validated at 10:01:30Z matches Log Bs OrderValidation at 10:01:29Z, also within tolerance.

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Log As Payment Processed at 10:02:00Z and Log Bs PaymentCheck at 10:02:05Z differ by 5 seconds, exceeding the 2-second tolerance. Despite the gap, they likely represent the same event, with Log Bs note about a payment gateway delay suggesting a close match.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Log As Item Shipped at 10:05:00Z matches Log Bs Shipping at 10:05:02Z, within 2 seconds. Log As Item Delivered at 10:20:00Z has no match in Log B, leaving it unpaired.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Log Bs Quality Check at 10:03:00Z has no match in Log A, so include it separately in the merged log. Log B ends with Shipping, ensuring all its events are considered for integration.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Combine timestamps, choosing Log As as primary since it reflects the received timeline, unless Log B provides start times.
